reviewText: I ordered this for my mom and she loves it!

Why this series was not complete in the USA is beyond me. I love the show. Good plots, good acting. The dvd I received in crisp and clear. The sound is good. You must have a player that can play it. Our regular USA players will not play it. It was a little costly, but worth it.
I did purchase Ironside 8 region 4 because I could watch any region. Glad that all episodes were released but none were remastered. It's too bad because all other seasons were.

I love Ironside. There is really not much more to say about it. I had to get a different (Zone free) DVD player to watch this and some other seasons. That wasn't as expensive as I thought it would be.
BECAUSE ONLY THE FIRST 4 SEASONS HAVE BEEN OFFICIALLY RELEASED IN U. S.  IRONSIDE FANS HAVE TO LOOK "DOWN UNDER" FOR THE OTHER 4 SEASONS....***IT'S WORTH IT*** GREAT QUALITY AND JUST GOOD TV !!!!

I was pleased to finally complete the whole 8 seasons.  I decided to get the Reg. 4 format as it seems these were never going to be released in the US during whats left of my lifetime (I'm almost 75).  However, I do have a player to play them on so no matter.  The first 4 seasons I have were released in US the last 4 are PAL, Reg. 4 Import- Australia.  They are equally viewable and of equal quality.  Maybe a little pricier, but better than not seeing them at all.  I am well pleased with my purchase and would recomend for the real Ironside fan.
